headline: Ask HN: Switching from iPhone to Samsung (S22 Ultra)
description:
I'm looking to switch from iPhone to Android since the customization, feature set, and google assistant seem far better than what iOS offers.

My main concern with switching: Quality Assurance issues and reliability. Do you see this as an issue for those who have experienced both Apple and Samsung relatively recently?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 从iPhone到三星（S22 Ultra）的转换
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 從iPhone到三星（S22 Ultra）的轉換
description_zh-Hans:
我想从iPhone切换到Android，因为定制、功能设置和谷歌助手似乎比iOS提供的要好得多。

我对切换的主要担忧。质量保证问题和可靠性。对于那些最近经历过苹果和三星的人来说，你认为这是个问题吗？
description_zh-Hant:
我想從iPhone切換到Android，因為定製、功能設置和谷歌助手似乎比iOS提供的要好得多。

我對切換的主要擔憂。質量保證問題和可靠性。對於那些最近經歷過蘋果和三星的人來說，你認為這是個問題嗎？
